title: Organizze Telegram Bot
description: AI-powered Telegram bot for personal finance insights using Gemini
alt: Organizze Telegram Bot with AI financial insights

modal.subtitle: Natural Language Financial Assistant
modal.fullDescription: A Telegram bot that integrates with Organizze (organizze.com.br), a popular Brazilian personal finance app with 87k+ reviews. Using Google Gemini AI, it provides natural language financial insights and visualizations. Users can query their finances in conversational Portuguese and receive contextual responses with charts and dashboards. Organizze handles expense tracking, bank account management, and Open Finance integrations with major Brazilian banks.
features: Natural language interface for financial queries in Portuguese
AI-powered analysis using Google Gemini for contextual responses
Visual dashboards with pie charts, bar charts, and summaries
Pre-built commands for common queries like balance and expenses
Whitelist-based access control via Telegram Chat IDs

title: ACCEF Platform
description: Intranet/backoffice platform for a social assistance organization

modal.subtitle: Social Organization Backoffice System
modal.fullDescription: An intranet/backoffice platform built for ACCEF (Associação Centro de Convivência Espaço da Família), a social assistance organization. The system handles volunteer management, donor tracking, beneficiary registration, asset inventory, program coordination, financial management, and reporting dashboards.
features: Beneficiary registration and management with demographic tracking
Volunteer and staff coordination modules
Asset inventory and loan management
Program and workshop scheduling
Financial tracking with donation management
Analytics dashboards and reporting

title: n8n-nodes-sklearn
description: Custom n8n nodes for integrating scikit-learn ML algorithms into workflows

modal.subtitle: Machine Learning Nodes for n8n
modal.fullDescription: Custom n8n nodes for integrating scikit-learn machine learning algorithms into your n8n workflows. This package enables no-code/low-code ML pipelines by bringing scikit-learn's powerful algorithms directly into the n8n automation platform.
features: Seamless integration of scikit-learn algorithms into n8n workflows
Support for classification, regression, and clustering models
No-code/low-code machine learning pipeline creation
Easy model training and prediction within automation workflows

title: Bias Reflector
description: AI-powered cognitive bias analyzer with interactive D3.js visualization

modal.subtitle: Cognitive Bias Analysis Tool
modal.fullDescription: Bias Reflector is a sophisticated web application that analyzes conversations for cognitive biases using Google's Gemini AI and visualizes them through an interactive D3.js radial cluster diagram. The tool helps users identify and understand the 188 cognitive biases from the Cognitive Bias Codex framework in real-time conversational exchanges.
features: AI-Powered Analysis: Leverages Gemini 3 Flash to detect cognitive biases in conversational text
Interactive Visualization: D3.js radial cluster diagram with 188 cognitive biases organized hierarchically
Real-time Detection: Instant analysis of two-way conversations with confidence scoring
Educational Tool: Helps users understand bias patterns and improve critical thinking
Responsive Design: Modern, mobile-friendly interface built with React and Tailwind CSS
